name: Spooky Mansion Ghost Funtime House Puzzle Solving Super Jumper Extravaganzapalooza: Slippy & Slappy's Catch of the Day
name_original: Spooky Mansion Ghost Funtime House Puzzle Solving Super Jumper Extravaganzapalooza: Slippy & Slappy's Catch of the Day
description: Capstone project for the Full Sail Game Design Program. The project was completed by 5 developers and 4 artists in a 4-month time frame. 3rd person platformer adventure game where a young girl enters a spooky mansion and gets her soul possessed. This allows her to turn to a ghost and enter areas where her human body can't enter. She travels through the mansion trying to get her soul back to win the game.
